Title: Establishes the transitional pathway program for students in higher education with autism spectrum disorder
Summary: Establishes the transitional pathway program for students in higher education at SUNY and CUNY schools with autism spectrum disorder to encourage accessibility and inclusivity in higher education for students with autism spectrum disorder; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the transitional pathway program for students in higher education with autism spectrum disorder
